Question.Subject: I ordered a book from amazon and it hasn't arrived after over a month?
Question.Content: What do I do? I tried contacting the seller but I got no reply, he's been given good feedback before...
Question.ChosenAnswer:
It may have gone to the wrong address or maybe something is up with the seller, he may have moved phone numbers or house etc. Also, if the book came from a long way away, it could take a long time to end up at your house. Try contacting amazon as well.
Thanks, Alapot :D

Answer.Content:
It may have gone to the wrong address or maybe something is up with the seller, he may have moved phone numbers or house etc. Also, if the book came from a long way away, it could take a long time to end up at your house. Try contacting amazon as well.
